website_summaries.verdict: A sound choice if you prefer a tandem option to side-by-side models. Otherwise, consider others on our shortlist.
pros: Lightweight but strong aluminum frame and 7 seating options
Tandem design is easy to get in and out of tight spaces
cons: When folded, it's not as compact as side-by-side models
Some children get fussy when not seated beside each other

customer_reviews.title: This Thing Is A Beast!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my twin cousins last June with Keyfit 30 carseats. This has held up well. If you empty EVERYTHING out of your trunk it can go there. I have a RAV4 and it JUST fits. Thankfully the pieces easily slide out, so you can put the frame in first and then the seats. It pushes smooth and has plenty under the seats doe storage. I seperately bought the Mickey bag for bottles/keys etc. It says 34lbs and they mean that, but I can lift it solo.
customer_reviews.author: Bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Best for whats around
customer_reviews.text: We are having twins and needed something that was tandem, "light weight", maneuverable, and able to hold TWO infant car seats. This so far has been the best option out there. Does it take some effort turning tight corners, YES, but with these requirements your not going to get anything better. I LOVED that I didnt need any tools to put it together (everything was clip/snap in place). It has only been a couple weeks but we are pleased with it so far. If issues arise I will update the review. Im happy its not super wide so we can fit through reg doors!
customer_reviews.author: adaley4

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, lots of storage
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, lots of storage. My only complaints: 1. The seats are small. My 2.5 year old is almost too big for the seat and I was hoping to have him in this stroller for at least 2 more years. Wish they had bigger seats or an option to purchase a larger seat as an accessory. 2. It's bulkier (longer) than the UppaBaby Cruz (however, I suppose this allows for more second row leg room than the Cruz) 3. It's difficult to go over bumps in the sidewalk because it is so long (the front end gets heavy and makes it hard to lift when you need to maneuver over a bump in the road).
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee C.

customer_reviews.title: If you expect a twins, go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Was recommended by one of friends, first of all it's really a very well made stroller, the material is very solid and still it was very light, had some small issues in folding it at the begging but few times later it became easy to use, one advantage with this model is that you can buy a convector and use majority of the car seats in the market. All in all highly recommended for families with twins, just make sure you have a big car :)
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed K.

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stroller! I have 2 under 2 and this works perfect for us!!! My favorite part is how I can move the seats around, so many options! The foot rest can click into many different levels. My oldest loves to have his feet up. We did purchase the car seat adapter for our chicco keyfit 30 car seat. This worked great! This stroller folds up into this perfect size. Fits great in every trunk I have put in. The stroller glides effortlessly and can take bumps like it’s nothing. My kids love this stroller and are excited every time they are in it. Amazing! Can’t say enough good about this stroller!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Stroller is too big, doesn’t fit into the trunk ...
customer_reviews.text: Stroller is too big, doesn’t fit into the trunk. Also, doesn’t maneuver correctly and steers to the right. One of the seats doesn’t stay up correctly. Customer service didn’t do anything to resolve.
customer_reviews.author: Liana Niblack

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it for the price you pay. It folds up huge. I have a suburban (big SUV) and it takes up the entire trunk. Also you can't really move the seats very well due to limited leg space. I am shocked to say that there are no cup holders, trays, or any sort of storage near the hand rails.
customer_reviews.author: Halie E.

customer_reviews.title: Really big
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it's pretty big and heavy. It takes up my entire Jeep Patriot trunk. It's also pretty big to maneuver through stores.
customer_reviews.author: CM Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and weight to take anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to fold and open! Took our 3 yr old twins to Disney and it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Henry Hess

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stroller, just if you’re short you can not adjust the handle bar lower.
customer_reviews.text: It Took me about 10 minute too assemble the stroller, the instructions was very simple too! I’m so happy with my stroller, and I also purchased separately the infant part too. It’s really big but it’s so necessary with an amazing storage part on the bottom. The only thing I don’t like is that I am 4’11 and the handle on the stroller is high up, so It’s uncomfortable for me to have my arms up when my other stroller it was a perfect length for me too push. Just wish I can adjust the handle bar, but other than that! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Features of uppababye with a better price!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller!! Just had my second baby (infant and I have a 3yo) and my 3yo still loves to ride in the stroller. This has seat, car seat adapter and bassinet options that can be turned multiple ways, a huge dodge basket and is easy to push! Only negative is the cup holder but that doesn’t matter for me because I have a stroller organizer for my cups. Def comparable to Uppababy but a much better price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Stroller for a very affordable price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! It definitely is big, feels like a train but I would rather push a longer stroller then a wider stroller and not be able to fit into doors well. It does take a lot of space in my trunk but I drive an SUV so there is plenty of space in my trunk anyways. The bottom basket has so much space to carry a lot and the stroller is easy to maneuver. All in all I give this a 5 star rating for the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: So smooth and easy to assemble. Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: The design is great! Lots of storage space beneath, compact design, and comfortable. It's so easy to put together. Every thing can just click and unclink together easy!! Mo stress or brute force needed. The wheels are very nice and goes well over all terrain. I tested out several double strollers before settling on this.
customer_reviews.author: Tam nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Must have for moms who have more than one toddler or a baby and a toddler. My children love this stroller and are so comfortable in it. The stroller has so many features and it's definitely worth the money. It took my husband some time to put it together, but not too long.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. I love the fact that you can face the kids however you want because it makes everything so much simpler and you have the option to recline the seats as well while the kids are sleeping. On top of it all it glides like it's made of butter.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Kat

customer_reviews.title: Ferrari of strollers Iove mine!
customer_reviews.text: It's HUGE! I love it! Don't take to places with narrow passages, won't work. But that's why it's great! I can fit 2 kids, so far ages 0 & 4 plus all our belongings AND shopping.
customer_reviews.author: Shealea

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic stroller
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I made. If you want a durable stroller for 2 young babies this is your best bet. I have a 1 year old 22 lbs and a new born on the way. This stroller took me 15min to put together. Easy to open and close and very easy to steer. Great for small shopping spree, basket is extremely spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylin

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller for twins
customer_reviews.text: This has worked well so far with our newborn twins in their Chicco Keyfit 30 car seats on the universal adapter (sold separately). We have used it primarily for walks around our neighborhood and my wife can push it easily even with recovering from a c section. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! But some issues
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble! Sturdy and I love the fact that it has shocks and doesn’t tip over easily like other strollers. Only problem is that it is not easily maneuvered at all! Going over the simplest of cracks will stop it completely and it’s hard to lift when that happens.
customer_reviews.author: Abigayle West

customer_reviews.title: Amazing whip for my twins!
customer_reviews.text: I'm absolutely in love with this stroller! I have 5 month old twins (boy & girl) and was looking for something that was not to bulky, versatile and cute! This stroller checks off all three boxes! I've had a tandem stroller before and it was very, very long and bulky and heavy to lift. This stroller is the total opposite. The shipping was fast, I was expecting it to arrive on a Monday, but it came a day before. Overall I'm really satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Shantell N.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! it isn't too heavy at all, I load and unload this thing by myself all the time! It takes up alot of trunk space, but I can still manage. I am only 4'11 and this things rolls so amazingly! It did take me a few months to figure out how to adjust the seats! (The latch is at the top of the seat)
customer_reviews.author: Mong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for two!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is very easy to use and steers like a dream compared to the graco tandem stroller we used to have. I love that you can move each seat to face front or back. I also love that you can get the carseat adapters to hook an infant seat to the stroller!
customer_reviews.author: The Austin Family

customer_reviews.title: Nice stroller
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult to fold up. The seats are very narrow but our one year old fits just fine. We also purchased the bassinet attachment for this stroller and love that as well
customer_reviews.author: Alora M. Chance

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is amazing. It was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is amazing. It was very easy to assemble. When it came down to folding it to put in the trunk I was pleased that it was easy to do. It pushes very smooth and there is a large basket to put stuff in. I would definitely recommend others to purchase this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 & 6 years old 👍🏻
customer_reviews.text: I loved My 4 kids can used 😊 I really recommend 😉
customer_reviews.author: betsabe rosa

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. The only thing I dont like is that it's not easy to fold and unfold. Saved us at Disneyland with the kids and storage for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect double stroller, but bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this stroller except the fact that it is a little bulky. Bulkier than a bob jogging stroller, but it is expected for a double stroller. So easy to put together. It’s also compatible with my BOB britax infant car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter in law and son love it for the children.
customer_reviews.author: Ustica

customer_reviews.title: Arrived early and perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and in perfect condition. I have a newborn and a 2 year old and this works great for them. I love having the option to move the seats depending on their moods (toddler tantrums and all.) Definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: MotherOfGriffins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!! I did a ton of research on double strollers and, while I like the BOB, I really couldn't find a reason to spend the extra $200-300 for it. I'm SO happy I didn't, because this stroller is solid, well thought out, and incredibly easy to use. We have 2-Chico 30 car seats and, when using the appropriate adapter, they fit perfectly into it with a tight lockup. I know 2 people with BOB'a and they both question why they spent so much more. Don't second guess, this is a great stroller for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: TacMedic

customer_reviews.title: Very nice if you don't want to do a side by ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice if you don't want to do a side by side option. We have a three year old that we keep in the front seat and a nine month old in the back seat. The back seat reclines very far back so she gets to nap comfortably in there. It is very sturdy and easy to maneuver. The only drawback, it is absolutely huge even when folded up.
customer_reviews.author: DBERN

customer_reviews.title: Huge and heavy
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for traveling but when i got it .. it was so huge and heavy. It’s hard for tow child to sleep in the same time.
customer_reviews.author: AlDana

customer_reviews.title: We love the durability
customer_reviews.text: We love the durability, ease of use, the way you can change the seats around and its comfortable. It fits in my Jeep Cherokee which surprised us. Highly recommend this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Double Stroller - Two Thumbs Up
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect in respect of its functionality. My only grip would be the awkward collapsing feature and how bulky it is. Solid stroller though. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: derek tafua

customer_reviews.title: JUST BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is so worth🙌🏼 Such a good price for a double stroller that looks this nice and maneuvers well! So much storage as well! Perfect for my newborn and toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Phelps

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2 seats
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to fold. Need to remove one seat to fit it in the back of small SUV. Easy to push and steer. Kids are very secure and like having to big seats instead of the sit n stand type
customer_reviews.author: TxMedStudent

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my 8-month-old and 2.5-year-old. Easy to assemble, nothing was damaged and arrived very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa McGee

customer_reviews.title: My son & daughter in law love it. Make sure & order the snack tray ...
customer_reviews.text: My son & daughter in law love it. Make sure & order the snack tray to go with it, grandkids will be glad.
customer_reviews.author: milrod

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I like how beautiful is the stroller, light and easy to Carry, the babies seem to be comfortable in it, and You have space for everything you need to carry. The only thing that I think is that it’s too large., but you know is a double stroller. Quality is great
customer_reviews.author: Karla Torres

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. It's lightweight, perfect for my almost 3 year old and 5 month old. They love facing each other. The different seating options make this stroller fun
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed to expand the time of use for the stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Kamber Denham

customer_reviews.title: Very nice double stroller!
customer_reviews.text: This thing folded perfectly in my trunk for my 19 jeep cherokee! Gotta admit i was worried it wouldnt fit or let me have any space left. But i actually still have room left for groceries😁
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Satchell

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Very sturdy yet easy to manipulate. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! Easy to maneuver, lots of seating options, and nice big basket underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The stroller arrive and it is good as saler mintione
customer_reviews.author: Abdel

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVER
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller back in December. I was worried with 2 babies under 2 that having to invest in a double stroller was a nightmare. I was worried it won't fit in store aisles or in doorways. I was worried it wont fit in the back of my explorer with the third row up. BEST PURCHASE EVER! I regained my freedom with this stroller. It's easy to push, the chairs move like I want. I have an 8 month old and almost 3 yr old. Perfect for naps no matter the age. If you remove the chairs from the actual stroller, it folds tighter, allowing me to put it in my 2016 explorer with the third row up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and easy to use. Fits fine in our trunk.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this stroller. And it’s compatible with my Nuna car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Janina Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I love how the canopy opens up to cover even more. Strolls great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this stroller. Pushes easily, very versatile and light for loading
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth the money. No double stroller ...
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but worth the money. No double stroller is truly small or compact. It's snazzy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The best stroller for 2 children. Easy to push and fold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It came it and is awesome just little long but very cool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Garrison

customer_reviews.title: The best double stroller ever!!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is the best! I love love it! and would recommend it to anyone with 2 little ones!!
customer_reviews.author: Ashli

customer_reviews.title: Love it...most of the times
customer_reviews.text: The look and versatility is amazing. Get compliments on the regular. The only downside is collapsing the thing. It's a pain sometimes, and it doesn't stand up when collapsed. Falls right over. Also When you roll it in the collapsed form, the handle drags and gets torn up. Which the collapsed form was a little better designed. Overall I'm happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Bob

customer_reviews.title: the grand children love the stroller
customer_reviews.text: the grand children love the stroller. They adopted a child and 2 months later she was pregnant. It works great for 2 greatgrand children that are close in age.
customer_reviews.author: juron

customer_reviews.title: Easy to turn and get around
customer_reviews.text: Easy to turn and get around. It does take up a lot of room in the car and is heavy but besides that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Rodz

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, best bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: This is a great double stroller. It is priced much lower than anything of comparable quality. Kids love it, mom loves it, my wallet loves it (I expected to pay closer to $800 for something this nice).
customer_reviews.author: ManInCubicle

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for 2 yrs and 3 months boys.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Bak

customer_reviews.title: feels like the stroller is made for Malls super smooth floors ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought bumbleride idie first and then bought this one to compair the two. Obviously bumbleride is the Mercedes and Contours is a chevy... i dont know what they were thinking putting on those hard rubber wheels, feels like the stroller is made for Malls super smooth floors rather then asphalt. You can feel every tiny rock and crack woth these wheels. Contours if your saving money on the wheels atleast make inflatable tires available as an add on.. otherwise the contours elite beats bumbleride in every way.. you can fit threw all the doors with out folding it, you can have kids face you if you like, its lighter.. but Contours did cheap out on the visers :( uhhh
customer_reviews.author: Sev

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mom of 4 2 under 2 and this is best stroller I've ever bought and is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Cora Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: buy the accessories, i.e. toddler tray, stroller organizer and car seat adapter if you have an infant
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Not for moms who are short or cannot carry heavy ...
customer_reviews.text: Not for moms who are short or cannot carry heavy weight. It is heavy as hell and bulky, hard to close. Won’t fit in my suv.
customer_reviews.author: Marck

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product. But too big when folded with seats. You need an SUV or a sedan for the stroller which might barely fit in the sedan.
customer_reviews.author: muheet a.

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to push and handle
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my daughter, who really likes the stroller. It's easy to push and handle.
customer_reviews.author: Jebr

customer_reviews.title: Easy tandem seat
customer_reviews.text: Too bulky, hard to turn, hard to let down, too big to put in my truck. I have to take off one seat and place it inside my car. I have a Grand Prix. Easy tandem seat.
customer_reviews.author: Reva Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller. Doesn't come with connectors for the car seats. These must be purchased separately. This is a good thing to know if you want to use it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Cotton

customer_reviews.title: The BEST double stroller
customer_reviews.text: The BEST double stroller! I had one for my twins 5 years ago and bought another one to use now with my triplets. This stroller is so easy to push and steer its perfect for using in stores. And the seats can be reconfigured pretty much any way but sideways, which is perfect when you have two toddlers who have to ride in the same stroller but can't exactly get along.
customer_reviews.author: SGZ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to go up and down driveways on the sidewalk, you really have to push!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa V.

customer_reviews.title: Poor Manufacturing Control
customer_reviews.text: One star at the moment. It is quite clear that this stroller was assembled with a bent arm that supports the basket. I noticed it looked wrong immediately. Of course immediately is relative since the stroller assembly is the LAST thing you pull from the box. The top of the box says to call Contours if you see damage and not to take it back to the store. Oh, but don't call on a Saturday, because there is no customer service or even an answering system on the weekend. We will see how Contours and Amazon handle this. Perhaps a better rating is coming.
customer_reviews.author: GWB in Ky

customer_reviews.title: only negative is the net below tears pretty easy but having all the options to change the ...
customer_reviews.text: its an adjustment from a single bob stroller but it can carry quite a bit! only negative is the net below tears pretty easy but having all the options to change the kids around is great! and I recommend buying the britax carseat adapter for infant britax carseat! it's great to just be able to pop the baby in with his older sister. I looked at a lot of strollers before buying and I'm glad I chose this one over a side by side!
customer_reviews.author: Georgiapeach2018

customer_reviews.title: GREAT STROLLER
customer_reviews.text: Everything i wanted plus some! Shipping was fast and it came before expected time. If your looking for a double stroller for kids of different ages, that strolls smooth, and looks good. Than this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... stroller from a couple vendors and by far the best deal from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: We had been comparing prices for this stroller from a couple vendors and by far the best deal from Amazon. The stroller itself is AMAZING, I love it and my babies love it. Its pretty big but surprisingly easy to steer, I really do love everything about it. 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I received a defective stroller. At first I thought it was just me not being able to use it because it was so big, but then I saw a friend who was simple to use. So I purchased a new one and relized mine was defective. Tried to return the defective one to Amazon and got nowhere. I now completely wasted 300+ $ on the defective stroller. Contacted contours company and received no help.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: i love this stroller as do all my kids
customer_reviews.text: i love this stroller as do all my kids. the only thing that is hard to do it unfold it.......but not impossible
customer_reviews.author: rfurms

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this stroller! I recently went to babies r us to try just the contour options and there were a few things I didn't like about it that this model has! I love the Laguna print and all of the newer features the elite has to offer. The only negative thing I have to say is that it is a bit difficult to unfold/fold with one person.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift from my baby registry. My two year old looks very uncomfortable in this stroller the seat is to small for her. Not very easy to close and it doesn't close completely. I contacted the seller to return it and they are unhelpful and don't want to take the stroller back so now I'm stuck with an expensive stroller that I don't use.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

product_meta.title: Contours Options Elite Tandem Double Toddler & Baby Stroller, Adjustable Seating, Lightweight Frame, Car Seat Compatibility, Carbon Grey
product_meta.description: Color:CarbonThe award-winning Options Elite tandem stroller is the perfect stroller for your growing family. Enjoy the convenience of versatile seating configurations to keep everyone happy. Reversible seats with new lift-assist mounts for easy Face Forward & Backward, Face-to-Face, Back-to-Back seating options. Plus, the double stroller offers easy-standing fold with seats attached and a large basket for all your strolling necessities. Comfortable contoured handles and stylish new aluminum seat frames for a lighter weight design. Compatible with two infant car seats using our Contours Car Seat Adapters (sold separately). Supports children up to 40 lbs in each seat (80 lbs total). Two padded 5-point safety harness. Assembled Dimensions: 47" L x 26" W x 42" H. Folded Dimensions: 28.5" W x 43.5" H. Meets Disney size requirements when front seat is facing parent.
feature_bullets: 7 SEATING OPTIONS -- Versatile seating configurations to keep everyone happy. Reversible seats with new lift-assist mounts for easy Face Forward & Backward, Face-to-Face, and Back-to-Back seating options. The Contours Options Elite easily folds and auto locks with both seats attached.
LIGHTWEIGHT DESIGN -- Enjoy multiple seating options in a lighter-weight aluminum frame that is only 34 lbs. Easy to assemble and each seat accommodates up to 40 pounds.

FITS TWO COMFORTABLY -- Accommodates two infant car seats. Brand specific "click-in" adapters and universal car seat adapter available for purchase separately. List of compatible car seats shown below.
SMOOTH RIDE -- Dynamic front and rear wheel suspension, sandal-friendly brake pedals and 10" quick-disconnect rubber-coated rear wheels for the best ride.

ELITE FEATURES -- Stadium style seating with recline, in-seat pockets, adjustable footrests and padded 5pt safety harnesses. Also includes extra-large storage basket with zipper side access and expandable canopies with mesh panel and peek-a-boo windows. Convenient parent cup holder also included.
MANUFACTURER NOTE -- As the manufacturer, we stand behind all our products with great customer service and support. If there is anything we can do to help you, please let us know.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars207 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
